translation.en: [Morgan on recording] So, what's the news, Dave?
translation.zh: 有什么事 锡镐？

translation.en: [Dave on recording] Morgan, uh, I'm calling you to tell you
translation.zh: 摩根 我打电话是想告诉你

translation.en: that, uh, Grace is pregnant.
translation.zh: 格蕾丝怀孕了

translation.en: And, uh, we're havin' a baby.
translation.zh: 我们要有宝宝了

translation.en: I mean...
translation.zh: 我是说…

translation.en: when we told our parents the news,
translation.zh: 当我们告诉父母时

translation.en: their emotion,
translation.zh: 他们当时…

translation.en: it was of pure joy, right?
translation.zh: 都非常激动 知道吗？

translation.en: And...
translation.zh: 以及…

translation.en: -[interviewer] Want to show it to us? -[chuckles] Yeah.
translation.zh: -你要给我们看看吗？ -好啊

translation.en: I don't have my phone.
translation.zh: 我的手机没在这里

translation.en: Ah, there it is.
translation.zh: 在这里呢

translation.en: [Dave] I was unprepared for the emotion.
translation.zh: 我没想到他们那么激动

translation.en: [Sherri] Thank you. Thank you, Jesus!
translation.zh: 谢谢 谢谢 上帝！

translation.en: [Dave] I knew it was gonna be important,
translation.zh: 我知道这很重要

translation.en: but I-- I was, like, not ready for this.
translation.zh: 但我还没有准备好

translation.en: [Joe on phone] Guys, it's the happiest moment
translation.zh: 各位 我在这个国家的60年中

translation.en: in 60 years in this country.
translation.zh: 这是我最开心的时刻

translation.en: [Joe] I'm so proud of you, son.
translation.zh: 我好为你骄傲 儿子

translation.en: [Dave, tearfully] Thanks, Dad.
translation.zh: 谢谢 爸爸

translation.en: [Joe] You have a baby. You have a wife.
translation.zh: 你有孩子了 你有妻子了

translation.en: -[Joe] Okay. -[Dave] Okay, Dad.
translation.zh: -好吧 -好的 爸爸

translation.en: -I love you guys. -[Joe] Ah. Yeah, I so love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你们 是啊 我也好爱你

translation.en: [Dave] I knew they were gonna be happy,
translation.zh: 我知道他们会很开心

translation.en: but I had no idea they were gonna be that happy.
translation.zh: 但我没想到 他们会那么开心

translation.en: So...
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: -[interviewer] Wow. That's amazing. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -太不可思议了 -是啊

translation.en: Very powerful.
translation.zh: 非常不可思议

translation.en: So...
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: I mean...
translation.zh: 我是说…

translation.en: just thinkin' about that, it's fucking crazy to me.
translation.zh: 哪怕只是想想 都觉得不可思议

translation.en: [Mary Sue] The problem with being a chef and a parent
translation.zh: 既做主厨 又做家长

translation.en: is that being a chef takes a ton of hours.
translation.zh: 主要问题就是 当主厨很费时间

translation.en: It's... all-consuming.
translation.zh: 两者都很费时

translation.en: [Johnny] We really, really knew we wanted to have a kid.
translation.zh: 我们都很想要孩子

translation.en: We were just looking for the right timing.
translation.zh: 我们只是在等待时机

translation.en: With having children, it's never the right time.
translation.zh: 但要孩子这件事 从来没有时机合适一说

translation.en: Ever.
translation.zh: 从来没有

translation.en: Especially as a chef,
translation.zh: 尤其是作为主厨

translation.en: for a long time, all you do is consider
translation.zh: 很长时间里 你所想的

translation.en: what you're doing, what you're going through,
translation.zh: 你所做的 你要经历的

translation.en: and the restaurant. That's the singular most important thing.
translation.zh: 以及餐馆 那是最重要的

translation.en: And all of a sudden, that changes.
translation.zh: 突然之间 一切都变了

translation.en: You have something else that you're responsible for,
translation.zh: 你又有新的东西要负责了

translation.en: and it just kinda fucks with you like nothing else...
translation.zh: 绝对会将你的生活打乱

translation.en: you know, will.
translation.zh: 威力无比

translation.en: [Mary Sue] Once you become a parent,
translation.zh: 一旦成为家长

translation.en: for me, it was the first time that anything in my life
translation.zh: 对我来说 这是在我人生中第一次

translation.en: was more important than cooking.
translation.zh: 有东西比烹饪更重要

translation.en: You get told, you know, "It's either a career or a child."
translation.zh: 别人会说 “事业和宝宝不能兼顾”

translation.en: Like, why?
translation.zh: 到底为什么呢？

translation.en: Why does it have to be a career or a child?
translation.zh: 为什么两者不能兼顾呢？

translation.en: All right. [exhales deeply]
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: [chuckles] I'm so tired.
translation.zh: 我好累啊

translation.en: -I'm so tired. -[water runs]
translation.zh: 我太累了

translation.en: So, I've been on the road too much.
translation.zh: 我出差太久了

translation.en: So much.
translation.zh: 太久了

translation.en: [Dave] So we have nothing in the fridge other than...
translation.zh: 我们家冰箱里什么都没有 只有…

translation.en: This is basically what Grace has been eating
translation.zh: 这些基本是格蕾丝

translation.en: for every meal.
translation.zh: 每餐吃的东西

translation.en: So, it's kimchi jjigae with ground soybeans.
translation.zh: 这是泡菜汤加大豆粉

translation.en: [Dave] It looks terrible. Look at this.
translation.zh: 看着好恶心 你看看

translation.en: When I first started to date Grace, and Grace would be craving this dish,
translation.zh: 我刚开始跟格蕾丝交往时 格蕾丝很想吃这道菜

translation.en: I'd be, like, "Wow...
translation.zh: 我会说 “哇哦…

translation.en: That's gnarly."
translation.zh: 这也太难看了”

translation.en: [laughs] I mean, it's trash.
translation.zh: 简直跟垃圾一样

translation.en: [Grace chuckles] It's really good.
translation.zh: 很好吃啊

translation.en: [Dave] And I've been on the road so much
translation.zh: 我经常在路上奔波

translation.en: that it's been nice to have my mother-in-law come in
translation.zh: 如果我岳母能过来帮格蕾丝

translation.en: and help Grace out and feed.
translation.zh: 那就太好了

translation.en: What's goin' on, Grace?
translation.zh: 怎么了 格蕾丝？

translation.en: We have our 20-week scan.
translation.zh: 我们做了20周检查

translation.en: It's a pretty big deal, you know, to come... get this far,
translation.zh: 走到现在 你懂的 这是非常重要的

translation.en: and so now we're just making sure in the second trimester
translation.zh: 所以现在我们要确保 在妊娠中期

translation.en: everything's going well.
translation.zh: 一切都能顺利

translation.en: [Dave] We found out pretty early on. We found out at, like, nine weeks, right?
translation.zh: 我们挺早就发现了 我们大概在第九周就发现了 对吧？

translation.en: [Grace] Yeah, that we're having a boy.
translation.zh: 是啊 那时候发现怀上男孩的

translation.en: [interviewer] What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: -[chuckles softly] It's a boy. -Yeah. Yeah.
translation.zh: -是男孩 -是啊

translation.en: [Dave] This year's been so emotional.
translation.zh: 这一年非常让人激动

translation.en: But this is the first time we're gonna see it as a...
translation.zh: 但这是第一次 我们把他看成…

translation.en: see the baby as, like, a...
translation.zh: 我们把宝宝看成…

translation.en: little humanoid.
translation.zh: 一个小家伙

translation.en: That's really exciting.
translation.zh: 真是让人激动

translation.en: -[Dave] So... -It's exciting.
translation.zh: -所以… -很激动

translation.en: I should brush my teeth.
translation.zh: 我要去刷牙了

translation.en: -[Dave] 'Cause you have kimchi breath? -[Grace] Yeah.
translation.zh: -因为嘴里都是泡菜味吗？ -是啊

translation.en: [chuckles] I'm gonna do that.
translation.zh: 我去刷牙了

translation.en: First of all, I never thought that someone would want to have a kid with me,
translation.zh: 首先 我从没觉得谁会想给我生孩子

translation.en: number one.
translation.zh: 首先来说…

translation.en: Work was my everything.
translation.zh: 工作曾是我的全部

translation.en: I think when I met Grace, it was, like, "Oh."
translation.zh: 当我遇到格蕾丝 我就想“哦”

translation.en: Like, "There are other things out there." [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我突然发现 在工作之外 还有其他事

translation.en: -[technician] Are you videoing? -[Dave] Yeah.
translation.zh: -你在录像吗？ -是啊

translation.en: I can't believe you can see this.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信 能够看这么清楚

translation.en: I do believe that Dave will end up being a better parent than...
translation.zh: 我相信锡镐会成为一个好父亲的

translation.en: he thinks.
translation.zh: 比他想的要好

translation.en: [Dave] Look how defined the spine is.
translation.zh: 看看脊椎多清晰呀

translation.en: Oh, my God. Is that his heart beating?
translation.zh: 天啊 那是他的心跳吗？

translation.en: -[technician] Yes. -[Dave] Oh, my God.
translation.zh: -是啊 -我的天啊

translation.en: [Grace whispering] He's been so emotional.
translation.zh: 他太情绪化了

translation.en: He was crying a lot.
translation.zh: 他总是哭

translation.en: So much.
translation.zh: 经常哭

translation.en: What would happen if you found out we're actually having a girl?
translation.zh: 如果你发现是女孩 你会怎么想？

translation.en: -[Dave] I'd be so happy. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 我会特别开心的

translation.en: [Dave] Just can't have another Chang man.
translation.zh: 张家受不了再添男丁了

translation.en: [Grace] Hello!
translation.zh: 你们好！

translation.en: -[woman] Hi! -Hi!
-[Grace] Hi! -Hey!
-[woman 1] Hi, David. -Hi, Mama.
translation.zh: -嗨 锡镐！ -嗨 妈妈

translation.en: [Grace] Hi. Hi, Sammie.
translation.zh: 嗨 萨米

translation.en: [Sherri] This is a miracle to see Grace and baby.
translation.zh: 我能看到格蕾丝和宝宝 真是奇迹

translation.en: My history...
translation.zh: 我以前…

translation.en: I've been so sick all the time.
translation.zh: 总是病怏怏的

translation.en: I've been cancer for 24 years.
translation.zh: 我得癌症24年了

translation.en: But, since, uh, two years ago,
translation.zh: 但两年前

translation.en: I-- I'm very serious, that time.
translation.zh: 我当时病得很严重

translation.en: And basically, the doctor told my mom,
translation.zh: 医生几乎是跟我妈说

translation.en: like, a hospice would be... would be appropriate.
translation.zh: 可以去找临终关怀了

translation.en: -Yeah. -So, they put her on some new stuff,
translation.zh: -是啊 -然后他们给她用了新药

translation.en: and, you know, long story cut short,
translation.zh: 然后 长话短说

translation.en: she's healthier than she's been in probably 20-plus years.
translation.zh: 她比这20多年都更健康了

translation.en: And when we told you over the phone that Grace and I were expecting,
translation.zh: 我们打电话告诉她 我和格蕾丝要有宝宝了

translation.en: you just-- I've never seen you behave that way.
translation.zh: 你当时… 我从没见过你那么激动

translation.en: How surprised I am.
translation.zh: 我当时很惊喜

translation.en: I was even crying that time.
translation.zh: 我当时都哭出来了

translation.en: My husband and me...
translation.zh: 我丈夫和我…

translation.en: Wow, we still alive, so I can see the... another baby. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我们还能活着看到宝宝

translation.en: Yeah, that's why I'm excited today.
translation.zh: 是啊 所以我当时那么激动

translation.en: Grace came over, so I'm making food for Grace.
translation.zh: 格蕾丝来了 所以我要给她做饭

translation.en: -This is the easiest of things. -[Dave] Such a show-off.
translation.zh: -这是最简单的 -真是得瑟

translation.en: -Is it for baby? -[Sherri] Yeah.
translation.zh: -这是给孩子做的吗？ -是啊

translation.en: [Grace] She's just showing me how to make this
translation.zh: 她在教我怎么做这道菜

translation.en: 'cause it's an easy dish to make for the baby.
translation.zh: 因为很简单 适合宝宝吃

translation.en: -[woman] What's it called? -[Dave] It's basically like an egg custard.
translation.zh: -这叫什么？ -基本上就像蛋羹

translation.en: You know what? This only the boiling water like this.
translation.zh: 这里只有开水

translation.en: -Ah. -Just to pour in this one.
translation.zh: 把蛋液倒进来

translation.en: -[Grace] Ah. -[Dave] You never make this for us!
translation.zh: 把蛋液倒进来 你从没给我们做过！

translation.en: [Sherri] I know. This is the newest one I've learned.
translation.zh: 我知道 这是我刚学的

translation.en: -[Dave] Oh, my God. -[Grace] Ooh!
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: [Sherri] And little bit of stir, like this.
translation.zh: 这样搅拌一下

translation.en: That's it.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: So simple. [chuckles softly]
translation.zh: 就这么简单

translation.en: What babies have you been feeding that to?
translation.zh: 你给哪个宝宝吃过这道菜？

translation.en: [Sherri] No one.
translation.zh: 没人吃过

translation.en: [Dave] Oh, man.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: -[Sherri] That's it. -[Grace] That's it?
translation.zh: -好了 -好了

translation.en: [Sherri] Mm-hmm. So, everybody can make this kind of food.
translation.zh: 谁都会做这种菜的

translation.en: I think our moms are the Korean Julia Childs.
translation.zh: 我觉得妈妈就像 韩国版朱莉娅·查尔德

translation.en: I'm beginning to understand that, being a parent,
translation.zh: 我开始明白 为人父母…

translation.en: it's something I've not actively avoided,
translation.zh: 虽然不是我会主动避免的事情

translation.en: but it's been, sort of... [chuckles]
translation.zh: 但是因为工作…

translation.en: ...underdeveloped because of work.
translation.zh: 多少有点耽误

translation.en: -No? -[Esther] No, take a bite.
translation.zh: -不吃吗？ -吃一口吧

translation.en: [Dave] And the restaurants, more or less, have been my kids.
translation.zh: 一定程度来说 餐厅就是我的孩子

translation.en: -[Sammie] I'm gonna take a bite of Mom's. -Of mine? Okay.
translation.zh: -我要吃一口 -吃我的吗？好的

translation.en: [Dave] It's pretty good, right?
translation.zh: 很好吃吧？

translation.en: -You like it, Jonathan? -Yes.
translation.zh: -你喜欢吗 乔纳森？ -是啊

translation.en: David, I cannot wait for you to have your own kids.
translation.zh: 锡镐 我等不及要看你自己养孩子了

translation.en: -It's the best thing in the world. -It's gonna be easy.
translation.zh: -这是世上最美好的事情 -会很轻松的

translation.en: -You've never opened restaurants. -[Esther] You'll see.
translation.zh: -你没开过餐馆 -回头你就知道了

translation.en: But having kids is totally different, David.
translation.zh: 养孩子是完全不一样的 锡镐

translation.en: -[David] I don't know. -You cannot yell at a baby.
translation.zh: -我不知道 -你不能跟孩子嚷嚷

translation.en: -You cannot get mad at a baby. -[Sammie] Mama!
translation.zh: 你不能跟孩子生气

translation.en: -What about aggressive whispering? -[Esther] It doesn't work.
translation.zh: -咄咄逼人的私语呢？ -也不行的

translation.en: You have experience handling lots of stress,
translation.zh: 你有处理压力的经验

translation.en: but having children is a different story.
translation.zh: 但养孩子是另外一码事

translation.en: -[Esther] Oh! No! Jonathan... -[laughing]
translation.zh: 不行！乔纳森…

translation.en: [Esther] Don't laugh at that, David.
translation.zh: 不要笑啊 锡镐

translation.en: -That was awesome. -[Esther] You can't laugh at those things.
translation.zh: -太扯了 -这种事不能嘲笑的

translation.en: That's the thing.
translation.zh: 就是会这样

translation.en: I don't think you know what's coming yet.
translation.zh: 我觉得你是还没搞清楚状况

translation.en: [Dave] I think it's been a lot of growing up,
translation.zh: 我觉得长大成人并不简单

translation.en: but also, things are more confusing to me than ever before.
translation.zh: 但同时 事情比以前更让我困惑

translation.en: I've almost become like Peter Pan.
translation.zh: 我几乎变成彼得·潘了

translation.en: In some ways, I feel like I'm 120 years old.
translation.zh: 某种程度上 我觉得自己已经120岁了

translation.en: And there are other parts of my life
translation.zh: 但在生活的其他部分

translation.en: where I have no idea what the fuck is going on.
translation.zh: 我根本不知道到底会发生什么

translation.en: Before you start you gotta decide, what are you gonna cook?
translation.zh: 在开始之前 你必须决定要煮什么？

translation.en: Muffin.
translation.zh: 玛芬蛋糕

translation.en: A muffin?
translation.zh: 玛芬蛋糕吗？

translation.en: -Yes. -You want to cook a muffin?
translation.zh: -是啊 -你想做玛芬蛋糕呀？

translation.en: Okay, first you gotta sift the flour. You need to go shh-shh-shh.
translation.zh: 好的 你要先来筛面粉 你需要来…

translation.en: There's, like, a... a big moment of reckoning right now,
translation.zh: 就像是到了进行清算的时间了

translation.en: between old Dave Chang and...
translation.zh: 在原来的张锡镐

translation.en: "Dad" Dave Chang.
translation.zh: 跟“父亲”张锡镐之间

translation.en: Expecting dad.
translation.zh: “准父亲”

translation.en: This is the muffin tins, okay? You gotta pour the batter in here.
translation.zh: 这些是玛芬蛋糕烤模 好吗？ 你要把面糊倒进来

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不行

translation.en: Pour this...
translation.zh: 把这些…

translation.en: into here.
translation.zh: 倒进这里

translation.en: You gotta put it into individual muffin tins,
translation.zh: 你要倒进每一个烤模里

translation.en: or you're basically making a cake.
translation.zh: 不然就是做了一个蛋糕了

translation.en: You're not making a muffin. You're making a cake.
translation.zh: 你不是做玛芬蛋糕 而是普通蛋糕了

translation.en: [Sammie] No. No!
translation.zh: 不 不要啊！

translation.en: -[Esther] And she's gone. -[Dave] Sammie, come back here.
translation.zh: -她跑了 -萨米 快回来

translation.en: [Grace] I had to remind him, "These aren't your employees.
translation.zh: 我得提醒他 “他们不是你的员工”

translation.en: This is your child,
translation.zh: 这是你的孩子

translation.en: so it's gonna be different."
translation.zh: 所以肯定是不一样的

translation.en: I'll-- I'll keep on playing, but you gotta make a muffin the real way.
translation.zh: 我可以继续陪你玩 但你要好好做玛芬蛋糕

translation.en: -Uh-oh. -[Dave] I'm heading into unknown territory.
translation.zh: 我在进入一个未知领域

translation.en: And, like most things in my life, I just figure it out by fucking it up.
translation.zh: 跟往常一样 我是在搞砸以后才发现的

translation.en: The difference is, like... [scoffs]
translation.zh: 区别在于…

translation.en: ...fucking this up might really have serious repercussions on someone:
translation.zh: 搞砸这件事 可能会对某人产生严重影响

translation.en: my-- this child.
translation.zh: 对孩子

translation.en: [Tae] Now that's good once you flip it. Yeah.
translation.zh: 翻面以后会很好的 没错

translation.en: I feel like it's, like, two or three minutes.
translation.zh: 我感觉只有两三分钟吧

translation.en: If it's taking that long, it's not hot enough.
translation.zh: 如果只有那么久 那就还不够

translation.en: [Dave] Tae is, like, all over the place.
translation.zh: 泰真是无处不在

translation.en: I'm trying to get him to be, like, less hands-on.
translation.zh: 我想让他少插手一些

translation.en: As weird as that sounds.
translation.zh: 虽然听起来很奇怪

translation.en: [Dave] You work like a crazy person, man.
translation.zh: 但你有点过于工作狂了

translation.en: Like, in the best possible sense.
translation.zh: 我是褒义的意思

translation.en: All I know is, like, you work a lot like me...
translation.zh: 我只知道 你工作起来很像我…

translation.en: in the kitchen.
translation.zh: 在厨房里

translation.en: I'm telling you, man, like, burning the candle at both ends
translation.zh: 我跟你说 蜡烛两头烧

translation.en: and just grinding it out and getting every last ounce of juice
translation.zh: 生拼硬凑 把每一滴果汁都榨干

translation.en: is, uh, not a healthy place to be.
translation.zh: 那样是不健康的

translation.en: Yeah, I'm trying to be smarter about how extreme my emotional investment is
translation.zh: 是啊 有些时候 我会试着更明智地

translation.en: in any given moment,
translation.zh: 处理感情投入

translation.en: before the kitchen has taken its toll on you
translation.zh: 免得厨房以一种无法解释的方式

translation.en: in ways that you can't account for.
translation.zh: 对我造成伤害

translation.en: Could you imagine having a family now?
translation.zh: 想过去成家吗？

translation.en: -In this moment? -[Dave] Yeah.
translation.zh: -现在吗？ -是啊

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: There's an element there where I'm like, "Fuck, man.
translation.zh: 我总有一种念头 “算了 伙计

translation.en: If I was to have kids right now, how does this affect your career?"
translation.zh: 如果现在要孩子 那事业怎么办？”

translation.en: It's always that thing in the back of my mind.
translation.zh: 我的心里总是这样想着

translation.en: Where it's like, "Could it derail your career?"
translation.zh: 我会想 “这会影响事业吗？”

translation.en: I mean, I definitely thought that.
translation.zh: 我绝对也这样想过

translation.en: How do you do what you do and then figure out time to have a family?
translation.zh: 如何在工作之余 找出时间来组建家庭？

translation.en: Yeah, that's like the-- That's the ultimate question, right?
translation.zh: 是啊 这是终极问题 对吧？

translation.en: ♪ Who knows where I'm gonna be I just try and be ♪
translation.zh: （俄勒冈州 波特兰）

translation.en: [Dave] I look at some people that have had kids,
translation.zh: 我看着别人养孩子

translation.en: and I don't know how they've done it.
translation.zh: 真不知道他们是如何做到的

translation.en: How do you get away from work?
translation.zh: 如何从工作中脱身呢？

translation.en: I-- I don't have that answer yet.
translation.zh: 我还没有找到答案

translation.en: [Peter] This wall separates our house side from the restaurant.
translation.zh: 这面墙隔开了房子和餐馆

translation.en: -This is awesome, man. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -太酷了 伙计 -是啊

translation.en: It feels very much just like you're at someone's home in Korea.
translation.zh: 感觉就像在韩国朋友的家里一样

translation.en: It really does.
translation.zh: 是啊 没错

translation.en: It's the feel of being in our home that I think people feel when they come here.
translation.zh: 人们来到这里时 感觉就像在家里一样

translation.en: But it also feels like New York.
translation.zh: 但也有纽约的感觉

translation.en: [laughs] Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: ♪ So I just go ♪
translation.zh: （艾略特 四岁）

translation.en: ♪ Forever yes, never no ♪
translation.zh: （弗兰克 一岁）

translation.en: [Dave] I still find it strange, in the best possible way,
translation.zh: 我还是觉得很奇怪

translation.en: that we're in your home.
translation.zh: 我们居然在你家里

translation.en: I'm like, "Peter, you got service!" [laughing] It's like 15 minutes away!
translation.zh: 我还会想 “彼得 得去店里了！ 路上还要15分钟呢！”

translation.en: -Yeah. -Are we 15 minutes out?
translation.zh: -是啊 -要花15分钟吗？

translation.en: [sighs] All right.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: I mean, what you'll find a lot is, like, you know, toys.
translation.zh: 我是说 你会在这里发现很多玩具

translation.en: He'll stash his toys around, and you'll find them in shelves and stuff.
translation.zh: 他会乱藏玩具 你会在架子上发现一些

translation.en: I think I met you when you first started cookin', right?
translation.zh: 我们认识时 你刚开始烹饪吧？

translation.en: -[Peter] Yeah. -That was crazy.
translation.zh: -是啊 -太疯狂了！

translation.en: It's funny 'cause I always looked up to you like an older brother.
translation.zh: 说起来有意思 我一直把你当作大哥

translation.en: But I never even caught up with you when you left New York.
translation.zh: 但你离开纽约后 我就跟你失去联系了

translation.en: I ended up leaving in quite a hurry.
translation.zh: 我走得比较匆忙

translation.en: My mom got sick, and we just kind of dropped everything
translation.zh: 我妈生病了 我抛弃一切来到这里

translation.en: to, like, come out here.
translation.zh: 我抛弃一切来到这里

translation.en: And then we were just like, "You know what? We're--"
translation.zh: 然后我们就想 “你知道吗？”

translation.en: I'm-- I was done with New York by that point.
translation.zh: 那时我对纽约已经不感兴趣了

translation.en: I had been there 13 years.
translation.zh: 我在那里13年了

translation.en: And the way I was able to switch my mentality
translation.zh: 我之所以能够转变心态

translation.en: was I moved to Portland.
translation.zh: 是因为我搬到了波特兰

translation.en: There's no, like, New York Times star ratings.
translation.zh: 这里没有《纽约时报》的评级

translation.en: There's no Michelin Guide.
translation.zh: 没有米其林指南

translation.en: There are none of these pressures that I felt in New York.
translation.zh: 这里没有我在纽约感受到的压力

translation.en: So, I can be here and just cook food that I want to cook,
translation.zh: 所以我可以在这里 做我想做的食物

translation.en: mainly for myself, and my friends, and my family.
translation.zh: 主要是为了我自己 以及亲朋好友

translation.en: -I just let go of all the sort of... -The nonsense?
translation.zh: -我终于抛下了那些… -没有意义的东西？

translation.en: ...all the nonsense. It is nonsense, you know?
translation.zh: 没有意义的东西 确实没有意义

translation.en: [Dave] Did having a kid help you realize what's important?
translation.zh: 生孩子以后 让你意识到什么更重要了吗？

translation.en: I mean, I think that sounds stupid, but--
translation.zh: 我是说 虽然听上去有点蠢 但是…

translation.en: -[Elliott] Daddy? -Yeah?
translation.zh: -爸爸？ -嗯？

translation.en: [Elliott] Uncle Dave just said "stupid."
translation.zh: 锡镐叔叔刚才说“蠢”了

translation.en: -[gasps playfully] -[Dave] Yeah, I said I'm stupid.
translation.zh: 是啊 我说我很蠢

translation.en: -[Peter] Oh! -I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我很抱歉

translation.en: -I apologize. -[Peter] There's a very strict rule of...
translation.zh: 抱歉 我很抱歉 说话的时候 必须斟字酌句

translation.en: of alternative words you can use. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 说话的时候 必须斟字酌句

translation.en: [Dave] Hey, Elliott. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 艾略特 我很抱歉

translation.en: -I have a potty mouth. -[Peter] Uh-oh.
translation.zh: -我说脏话了 -哦哦

translation.en: [Dave] I see what you've done here, and it's, like, wow.
translation.zh: 我看到这里写的了 简直无敌了

translation.en: The hominess of it all suppresses how insane it actually is. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 看上去没什么 但其实挺厉害的

translation.en: To live and work in the same roof is crazy.
translation.zh: 在同一个屋檐下生活和工作 这是很疯狂的

translation.en: [Peter] Yeah. But it works for us.
translation.zh: 但对我们来说 这是行得通的

translation.en: A lot of people come here
translation.zh: 很多人来到这里

translation.en: and they're like, "How do separate work and life?"
translation.zh: 会说“你怎么区别工作和生活？”

translation.en: And we're like, "I don't see how you can't."
translation.zh: 我们会说“我没觉得不能区分呀”

translation.en: I don't see how you can be like, "All right. Bye, Elliott.
translation.zh: 我觉得我没法说 “拜拜 艾略特

translation.en: I'll see you in 14 hours."
translation.zh: 我们14小时以后再见”

translation.en: [chuckles] Which is what many of our peers wind up doing.
translation.zh: 我们很多同行最终都是这样的

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: We thought, "Okay, This could be the dining room. You know?
translation.zh: 我们觉得 “这里可以做餐厅

translation.en: We can raise our family in the rooms on the side.
translation.zh: 我们可以住在侧面的房间里

translation.en: We can build a little wall."
translation.zh: 可以在中间隔一道墙”

translation.en: But people walked into my bedroom, thinking it's the bathroom.
translation.zh: 但有些人会走进我们卧室 以为那是厕所

translation.en: And so many times that happened while I was nursing Elliott.
translation.zh: 我在喂艾略特时 发生过很多次

translation.en: I didn't need it to be that close,
translation.zh: 其实不需要距离那么近

translation.en: but, you know, it's worth it for all the family time we get to have.
translation.zh: 但我们能有很多家庭时光 这就值了

translation.en: So, this is as traditional as our meal gets, right?
translation.zh: 这跟我们的传统饮食一样

translation.en: Because it's all the banchan.
translation.zh: 这里有各种小菜

translation.en: And then we kind of do this as, like, the ssam... like, the ssam course.
translation.zh: 我们会像做点心一样去做

translation.en: So we have just some grilled hanger steak with the lettuces.
translation.zh: 我们有烤牛排配生菜

translation.en: This is our bossam with the rice paper.
translation.zh: 这是米纸卷五花肉

translation.en: -[Dave] This is great, man. -[Sun] That's basically the menu.
translation.zh: 太棒了 伙计 主要就是菜单

translation.en: He just makes whatever we miss about New York,
translation.zh: 他做的菜肴 寄托了对纽约的怀念

translation.en: the things we like about LA. He just riffs off of it.
translation.zh: 对洛杉矶的喜爱 他会即兴做一些菜

translation.en: How do you find time to cook for your kids
translation.zh: 你们要做这么多菜

translation.en: when you have all this food?
translation.zh: 怎么有时间给孩子做饭呢？

translation.en: For a little while,
translation.zh: 有一段时间

translation.en: Elliott wouldn't eat the food from the restaurant
translation.zh: 艾略特不吃餐厅的食物

translation.en: It was just, you know, it wasn't simple enough for him.
translation.zh: 因为对他来说 这些食物不够简单

translation.en: It was really hard on Peter.
translation.zh: 当时彼得特别郁闷

translation.en: Do you know what it's like for a chef
translation.zh: 你知道那是什么感觉吗？

translation.en: whose kids won't eat your food? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 作为主厨 儿子不吃自己做的东西

translation.en: Cheers.
translation.zh: 干杯

translation.en: -May God bless you with a good eater. -[Dave laughs]
translation.zh: 愿上帝保佑你美餐一顿

translation.en: When you're a chef and you have a new child,
translation.zh: 作为主厨 我当爸爸以后

translation.en: and you think, "I'm buying all this food that's just puréed,"
translation.zh: 我会想 “我就买那些蔬菜泥吧”

translation.en: and "Why are the green beans this army-green color?
translation.zh: 然后会想 “青豆泥怎么都是橄榄绿色？

translation.en: I can make them green." So I did.
translation.zh: 我能做成青绿的” 于是我就自己做了

translation.en: But it was helpful to have some extra hands.
translation.zh: 但如果能有帮手 那就太好了

translation.en: At WD50, we used to get people that would come
translation.zh: 在WD50 我们过去会招聘想来的人

translation.en: and they'd want to work at the restaurant just to gain experience.
translation.zh: 他们来餐厅工作 就是为了获得经验

translation.en: I would make a really nice carrot puree,
translation.zh: 我会做很好的胡萝卜泥

translation.en: or a bright-green zucchini puree,
translation.zh: 或者鲜绿色的西葫泥

translation.en: and I would say, "I want you to pass this twice
translation.zh: 我会说 “我希望你用细筛子

translation.en: through a really fine sieve,
translation.zh: 把菜泥筛两遍

translation.en: put it in these beautiful silicone molds,
translation.zh: 放进漂亮的硅胶模具里

translation.en: and freeze them.
translation.zh: 然后冻起来

translation.en: When they're frozen, take them out
translation.zh: 冻好以后 都取出来

translation.en: arrange them in these zip-lock bags, and bring them back to me."
translation.zh: 放到有拉链的袋子里 再拿给我看”

translation.en: "Yes, Chef." No questions asked.
translation.zh: “好的 主厨” 不要质疑 照做就行

translation.en: So, I would have people that would travel
translation.zh: 餐厅里的顾客

translation.en: from all over the world to come work at the restaurant.
translation.zh: 一般都是来自世界各地的人

translation.en: And they didn't know it, but they were actually making baby food.
translation.zh: 但他们并不知道 其实他们在给孩子做饭

translation.en: It takes a village.
translation.zh: 后厨齐动手

translation.en: [Nick] What is this?
translation.zh: 这是什么？

translation.en: [Dave] Just sliced apples.
translation.zh: 这是苹果片

translation.en: -That's it. -[Nick] Mm.
translation.zh: 就这样

translation.en: This is gonna be, like, dessert.
translation.zh: 这就是甜点

translation.en: -That's a dessert for a baby? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -这是给宝宝的甜点 -是啊

translation.en: You know what? Baby food is pretty simple.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？宝宝的食物很简单的

translation.en: -You cook the shit out of some vegetables, -[Nick] Yeah?
translation.zh: 你就烹饪一些蔬菜

translation.en: and you puree it so it's pretty easy to eat.
translation.zh: 然后做成菜泥 方便宝宝食用

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Almost all of it tastes terrible.
translation.zh: -嗯呢 -这些食物几乎都很难吃

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Dave] Because there's no salt.
translation.zh: -是啊 -因为没有盐

translation.en: [Nick] Oh, that noise!
translation.zh: 这种声音！

translation.en: I just want to get my mic in there for that noise.
translation.zh: 我很想用我的麦克风收音

translation.en: -Yeah, that noise. -[Dave] Oh, yeah!
translation.zh: -是啊 这种声音 -是啊

translation.en: So, to everybody at home, this is how your show is, right?
translation.zh: 致各位在家的朋友 你的节目就是这样 是吧？

translation.en: -Yeah. -So, everybody at home,
translation.zh: 在家的朋友们

translation.en: you might not have a professional hand blender,
translation.zh: 你可能没有专业手动搅拌机

translation.en: so you just use any infomercial product you can get your hands on.
translation.zh: 所以可以使用 任何能找到的电视购物产品

translation.en: In this case, we're using my high-powered dildo today.
translation.zh: 就我而言 我要用我的震动假阳具了

translation.en: [Nick] What do you got? Yams here?
translation.zh: 这是什么？山药吗？

translation.en: Delicious. If I were a baby or an adult, I would eat this.
translation.zh: 好吃 就算我是小孩 我也会吃光的

translation.en: That's actually really good!
translation.zh: 其实还真挺好吃的！

translation.en: [Nick] Now, is this how you would make yams for Thanksgiving?
translation.zh: 其实还真挺好吃的！ 感恩节的山药泥 你也这么做吗？

translation.en: No, I would mount it with as much butter as humanly possible.
translation.zh: 不会 我会尽可能多地加黄油

translation.en: And can babies have butter?
translation.zh: 宝宝可以吃黄油吗？

translation.en: I don't think that's kosher.
translation.zh: 我觉得不符合犹太教规吧

translation.en: -You want to keep your baby trim, right? -[both chuckle]
translation.zh: 你希望宝宝保持苗条 是吧？

translation.en: You want, like, a skinny baby, right?
translation.zh: 你想要苗条的宝宝 是吧？

translation.en: [Dave] Needs salt.
translation.zh: 需要加盐

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: But look at this color. It's gorgeous.
translation.zh: 但是颜色好漂亮

translation.en: Yeah, but no baby's gonna be, like, "Yeah! Gimme some more of that!"
translation.zh: 是啊 但宝宝不会说 “太好吃了！再给我多来点！”

translation.en: Maybe they hate vegetables growing up
translation.zh: 也许孩子从小就讨厌蔬菜

translation.en: because they get shitty fucking ways to cook it.
translation.zh: 是因为烹饪的方式太难吃了

translation.en: Oh, you're gonna start a fucking baby-food company.
translation.zh: 你一定要开一间婴儿辅食公司

translation.en: -"Baby Chang's." -[both laugh]
translation.zh: “张氏宝宝餐”

translation.en: Come on! How could you not start something called "Baby Chang's"?
translation.zh: 拜托！“张氏宝宝餐”创意多好啊！

translation.en: And you honestly look a little bit like a baby.
translation.zh: 而且你还真有一点娃娃脸

translation.en: -A little bit. -"I'm not only the chef, I'm also a client."
translation.zh: 有一点 我不仅是主厨 还是客户

translation.en: We have a baby to test the food.
translation.zh: 我们找到一个宝宝来品尝

translation.en: -That you just stole? -[Dave] Yeah.
translation.zh: -你偷来的吗？ -是啊

translation.en: -We stole a baby. He's sitting out there. -[Nick] On the street? Great.
translation.zh: 我们偷了一个宝宝 就在外面

translation.en: [Dave] Oh, my God. [Nick] Looks like we've got a hungry customer already.
translation.zh: -我的天啊 -看来这位顾客饿得不行了

translation.en: It doesn't look like he's gonna be a tough sell
translation.zh: 他都在啃桌子了

translation.en: if he's eating the table.
translation.zh: 所以应该很容易推销

translation.en: -Oh, nice job. -[Dave] What do you think?
translation.zh: -干得好 -你觉得怎么样？

translation.en: I'm gonna get a bad Yelp review. [Nick] Hey, man, you got something on your face.
translation.zh: -我要收到一条差评了 -你脸上有东西

translation.en: All we need is Tom Selleck and Steve Guttenberg, and we're set.
translation.zh: 我们只需要汤姆塞立克 和史蒂夫加顿伯格 就稳了

translation.en: -Yeah, he likes it. -[Nick] Oh, you gotta get that table, man.
translation.zh: -他很喜欢 -你最好把桌子做成菜

translation.en: Can kids eat wood, or no?
translation.zh: 孩子能吃木头吗？

translation.en: [Nick] I'm surprised by how much food is already all over him.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信 他已经吃得浑身都是了

translation.en: -[Dave] It's food on you, too! -Yeah, he just put his food on me.
translation.zh: -你的身上也有了呢！ -是啊 他都抹在我身上了

translation.en: -[gurgling] -I know you're a high-fashion guy,
translation.zh: 我知道你很爱赶时髦

translation.en: you're gonna have to rethink your whole wardrobe.
translation.zh: 我知道你很爱赶时髦 你得重新考虑一下你的衣柜了

translation.en: I want to dress the same as the baby.
translation.zh: 我想穿得像婴儿一样

translation.en: [Nick] This looks like honey mustard. Babies love honey mustard.
translation.zh: 看起来像蜂蜜芥末 宝宝都喜欢蜂蜜芥末

translation.en: [Dave] That's not good.
translation.zh: 不好吃

translation.en: [Nick] You want these peas?
translation.zh: 你想吃豌豆吗？

translation.en: [Dave] Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 天啊！

translation.en: Can you believe neither of us have had a child yet?
translation.zh: 我俩其实都没孩子 你能相信吗？

translation.en: Slip-sloppin' right out of his mouth.
translation.zh: 瞬间从嘴里吐出来了

translation.en: Do you wish more people at your restaurants
translation.zh: 你希望餐厅里的顾客们

translation.en: did that as they ate?
translation.zh: 吃饭时这样吗？

translation.en: -Are you taking a dump? Yeah! -[coos]
translation.zh: 你在拉屎吗？是哦

translation.en: Oh, I can't wait to see this come out
translation.zh: 我等不及看这些拉出来了

translation.en: in the rainbow of colors.
translation.zh: 便便都是彩虹色吧

translation.en: Your doodie's gonna look like an LGBTQ flag.
translation.zh: 你的便便会跟同志彩虹旗一样了

translation.en: I'm gonna feed more of these peas that this baby doesn't like.
translation.zh: 我要再喂一点宝宝不喜欢的豌豆

translation.en: Isn't it crazy to think you are going to be doing this
translation.zh: 你马上要喂一个小号的你了

translation.en: with, like, a tiny version of you, soon?
translation.zh: 这样想一想 会不会很疯狂？

translation.en: I don't even understand it.
translation.zh: 我都没有想明白

translation.en: This week on Ugly Delicious...
translation.zh: 本周的《不中看的美食》…

translation.en: tables and napkins,
translation.zh: 桌子和餐巾

translation.en: the most delicious thing in a baby's mouth.
translation.zh: 宝宝最爱吃的食物

translation.en: [Paul] Feeding children... you figure out what they like,
translation.zh: 喂养孩子… 你要搞清楚他们喜欢什么

translation.en: and you make whatever that is
translation.zh: 无论那是什么

translation.en: the most delicious and the most nutritious it could be.
translation.zh: 你都要做到最好吃 最有营养

translation.en: [Tom] I try to just have them eat what we're eating
translation.zh: 我试着让他们吃我们吃的东西

translation.en: and sometimes it's a struggle.
translation.zh: 有时简直是一场战争

translation.en: If I decide to pick a fight with him and try to force him to eat,
translation.zh: 如果我要强迫他吃

translation.en: I'm gonna lose this battle.
translation.zh: 那我一定会输的

translation.en: We're better off just putting the food down,
translation.zh: 最好的办法是把食物放下

translation.en: and if he says, "I don't wanna eat this," we ignore it.
translation.zh: 如果他说“我不想吃” 我们就无视他

translation.en: And, eventually, he'll eat it.
translation.zh: 他最终一定会吃的

translation.en: [Helen] She loves pizza.
translation.zh: 她喜欢披萨

translation.en: She saves the crusts and calls them "pizza bones."
translation.zh: 她不吃硬边 说那是“披萨骨头”

translation.en: And she'll eat those later.
translation.zh: 说以后再吃

translation.en: [Edouardo] I spend a lot of time thinking about the foods
translation.zh: 我花了很多时间

translation.en: that I cook at the restaurant
translation.zh: 思考在餐厅制作的食物

translation.en: And even our kids menu
translation.zh: 即使是我们的儿童菜单

translation.en: is driven on the foods that I would actually cook for my son.
translation.zh: 也是基于我给儿子做的食物

translation.en: [Floyd] My boys love food.
translation.zh: 我的孩子们喜欢吃东西

translation.en: So, it's very exciting for me to eat with them, cook with them,
translation.zh: 所以我很愿意 跟他们一起吃 一起做饭

translation.en: introduce them to cool stuff.
translation.zh: 给他们介绍很酷的东西

translation.en: I think that's the best gift I could've given them.
translation.zh: 我觉得这是我能给他们的最佳礼物

translation.en: [Paul] But kids are tricky.
translation.zh: 但孩子们很难搞

translation.en: You gotta treat each one like they're their own person.
translation.zh: 每个孩子都要区别对待

translation.en: You just can't, you know, put everybody in a box.
translation.zh: 不能所有都一视同仁

translation.en: [Dave] I feel like foods for kids, in general,
translation.zh: 我觉得给孩子们吃的食物

translation.en: has to get better.
translation.zh: 应该做得更好

translation.en: I mean, what we feed people in schools
translation.zh: 我是说 我们在学校提供的食物

translation.en: is garbage. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 简直就是垃圾

translation.en: It's like, the people that need to be fed the best
translation.zh: 最应该好好吃饭的孩子们

translation.en: are fed the worst.
translation.zh: 却在吃最难吃的东西

translation.en: And I know there are people that are actively working their asses off
translation.zh: 我知道有一些人正在拼尽全力

translation.en: to make that change.
translation.zh: 来做出改变

translation.en: The most talented and knowledgeable people that are in the food world
translation.zh: 在餐饮界最有才华和知识的人

translation.en: are catering to such a small percentage of people
translation.zh: 却在服务着很小比例的人

translation.en: And there's all these other people out there that need to eat,
translation.zh: 还有很多人需要吃东西

translation.en: but no thought is going into that.
translation.zh: 但没有人去考虑他们

translation.en: [Dave] I met Dan when he was at Noma.
translation.zh: 我是在诺玛餐厅认识丹的

translation.en: He was the head chef of the number one restaurant in the world.
translation.zh: 他是世界第一餐厅的主厨

translation.en: [Dave] You knew that you needed to make a change.
translation.zh: -你知道你需要做出改变 -是啊

translation.en: -Right. -And you hatched this idea
translation.zh: -你知道你需要做出改变 -是啊 你想出了在学校食堂工作的主意

translation.en: of you working in school kitchens.
translation.zh: 你想出了在学校食堂工作的主意

translation.en: [Dan] Yeah.
translation.zh: （丹·朱斯蒂想要改变 孩子们的饮食方式）

translation.en: The point of it is to get professionally trained chefs
translation.zh: 我的想法是 让专业厨师们

translation.en: to really rethink what school food can be.
translation.zh: 去重新考虑学校餐食能做成什么样

translation.en: [Dave] All right, let's go.
translation.zh: 好了 我们走吧

translation.en: [Dan] And you have third graders here today, Dave.
translation.zh: 今天是三年级学生 锡镐

translation.en: I'm trying to think, "What does a third grader want to eat?"
translation.zh: 我在想“三年级学生们想吃什么？”

translation.en: [Dan] Probably nothing that you've ever cooked.
translation.zh: 可能是你从来没做过的东西

translation.en: [Dan] If you're a public school in the United States,
translation.zh: 如果是美国公立学校

translation.en: you need to serve a meal that fits very strict nutritional guidelines.
translation.zh: 那么配餐一定要严格遵守营养指南

translation.en: These are dictated by the USDA.
translation.zh: 这些是美国农业部规定的

translation.en: So, you have oil, there's butter.
translation.zh: 这里有油 这里是黄油

translation.en: You see? That is how much butter you can use for four meals.
translation.zh: 看到了吗？四份餐只能用这么多黄油

translation.en: -It's not a lot. -Do you ever just, like, sneak more in?
translation.zh: -并不多 -你有没有偷偷多加过？

translation.en: [Dan] No, we can't. [Dave] 'Cause I might.
translation.zh: -没有 不行的 -我也许会哦

translation.en: [Dan] I should take a tally because you're gonna try to cheat.
translation.zh: 那我得做好记录 以免你作弊

translation.en: So, we have about $1.25 to come up with a lunch
translation.zh: 我们有大约1.25美元 来做一顿午餐

translation.en: that feeds kids.
translation.zh: 来给孩子们吃

translation.en: -[Dave] Can I get some honey? -Yep.
translation.zh: -我能放一些蜂蜜吗？ -可以

translation.en: -[Dave] Not that much, right? -[Dan] Stop. We can't afford that much.
translation.zh: -不能多加 对吧？ -停吧 要控制成本

translation.en: That's probably like 30% of your food cost right there.
translation.zh: 这大概是食物配额的30%了

translation.en: That's not enough.
translation.zh: 这还不够呢

translation.en: Damn it!
translation.zh: 可恶！

translation.en: [Dave] I can use as many vegetables as I want?
translation.zh: -我可以尽可能多用蔬菜吗？ -可以

translation.en: [Dan] Pretty much. Obviously, though, the vegetables are the hardest sell
translation.zh: 但是对孩子来说

translation.en: when it comes to the kids.
translation.zh: 蔬菜是最不受欢迎的

translation.en: And that's the hardest part.
translation.zh: 这就是最难的部分了

translation.en: You go through all this trouble, you come up with a meal,
translation.zh: 你有这么多难题 还想出了一顿饭

translation.en: and then a student who legitimately is starving
translation.zh: 然后一个饿着肚子的学生

translation.en: and hasn't eaten since lunch yesterday,
translation.zh: 从昨天午饭后就没吃过东西了

translation.en: chooses not to eat your meal
translation.zh: 但他选择不吃你做的饭

translation.en: because it's not appetizing to them at all.
translation.zh: 因为看上去一点也不好吃

translation.en: [Dave] This is hard, bro.
translation.zh: 这太难了 兄弟

translation.en: [Dave] I remember you telling me that "I'm gonna approach this
translation.zh: 我记得你告诉我 “我要用以前解决问题的方式

translation.en: the same way that I'd approach anything else in my life.
translation.zh: 来解决这次的问题”

translation.en: That's right.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: -"And I want to make a difference." -That's right.
translation.zh: -“我想要做出一些改变” -是的

translation.en: I think they'll like that.
translation.zh: 我觉得他们会喜欢的

translation.en: [Dan] I just love this right now. You're just, like, sweating.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你现在满头大汗的样子

translation.en: You're not even plating on a level surface.
translation.zh: 你甚至都没有摆盘整齐

translation.en: -What, you just abandon any kind of... -[Dave] Yeah.
translation.zh: -怎么 你打算抛弃各种… -是啊

translation.en: -Just plate up here. -I learned by watching you!
translation.zh: -就是盛在上面 -我是跟你学的

translation.en: [Dan] The whole reason we do tastings in the first place
translation.zh: 我们之所以要进行试吃

translation.en: is because a lot of these dishes we do for the first time are new.
translation.zh: 是因为我们做的很多菜都是新的

translation.en: If you just take a shot in the dark for 1,000 kids
translation.zh: 如果你铤而走险 直接给1000个孩子

translation.en: with a meal they've never had before,
translation.zh: 做他们从没吃过的东西

translation.en: you could have a real big disaster on your hands.
translation.zh: 你可能就要遇到大麻烦了

translation.en: -I think it looks very good. -[Dave] I think it looks good!
translation.zh: -我觉得看着很好吃 锡镐 -我也觉得！

translation.en: [laughs] I want to eat this.
translation.zh: 我都想吃了

translation.en: [Dan] All right, Dave. What have we got?
translation.zh: 好了 锡镐 你做了什么？

translation.en: I decided I'll make you guys a chicken rice.
translation.zh: 我决定给你们做鸡肉米饭

translation.en: [Dan] Go for it, you guys. Get into it.
translation.zh: 尝尝吧 孩子们

translation.en: [boy 1] It's actually kind of good.
translation.zh: 还挺好吃呢

translation.en: [Dan] "It's actually kind of good"? What did you say?
translation.zh: “还挺好吃呢”？

translation.en: [boy 2] The chicken is awesome.
translation.zh: -你觉得呢？ -鸡肉好吃爆了

translation.en: -[Dave] What do you think, sir? -[Dan] Do not rush him, okay?
translation.zh: -你觉得呢？ -不要催他 好吗？

translation.en: -Yes! -They're happy with the rice, man.
translation.zh: -太好了！ -他们觉得米饭很好吃

translation.en: You've done well.
translation.zh: 你做得不错

translation.en: You've done well, bro. -Thank you. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: -你做得不错 哥们 -谢谢

translation.en: [Dave] They're really putting away the food, man.
translation.zh: 他们把东西都吃了呢

translation.en: [Dan] They are. They like it. I will say, the work is really hard,
translation.zh: 是啊 他们很喜欢 诚然 这份工作很难

translation.en: but when you see, especially the little kids,
translation.zh: 但你看到这些小孩子们

translation.en: eating some of this stuff, you're just, like...
translation.zh: 吃到这样的东西 你就会觉得…

translation.en: -It's amazing. -You gotta feel good about that.
translation.zh: -太赞了 -你一定感觉很好

translation.en: I know, right? That's the stuff, man.
translation.zh: 是吧 就是这样的

translation.en: [Dave] So, tell me, what are you feeling right now?
translation.zh: 跟我说说 你现在是什么感觉？

translation.en: [exhales] I just want to eat something again.
translation.zh: 我又想吃东西了

translation.en: [sighs] First trimester is really hard.
translation.zh: 怀孕初期真的很艰难

translation.en: First trimester, I was miserable.
translation.zh: 最初三个月 我特别痛苦

translation.en: Any kind of food I would look at, I just couldn't.
translation.zh: 无论看见什么东西 都吃不下

translation.en: [Dave] How was your nausea yesterday?
translation.zh: 昨天恶心了吗？

translation.en: -Horrible. -[Dave] Horrible?
translation.zh: -特别严重 -特别严重？

translation.en: Hormones are gonna peak...
translation.zh: 荷尔蒙很快就会…

translation.en: soon.
translation.zh: 达到顶峰了

translation.en: It's so hard.
translation.zh: 太难了

translation.en: I would have moments of random cravings.
translation.zh: 我偶尔会有想吃东西的时候

translation.en: [Dave] The first craving she had was macaroni and cheese.
translation.zh: 她最早想吃的 是芝士通心粉

translation.en: I ran to the supermarket, bought everything.
translation.zh: 我赶紧跑到超市去买

translation.en: [Grace] He made a beautiful pot of macaroni and cheese.
translation.zh: 他给我做了一锅芝士通心粉

translation.en: [Dave] And then I brought it to her, and she was, like, "No."
translation.zh: 然后我送到她面前 她说“不想吃”

translation.en: -[laughs] -[Grace] I did not want that.
translation.zh: 我不想吃

translation.en: I told him, specifically, "From the box." I didn't even touch the one he made.
translation.zh: 我跟他说 “我要吃快餐那种” 我都没有碰他做的

translation.en: I knew how sad he was.
translation.zh: 我知道他很难过

translation.en: But he can't say anything. He's like, "Okay.
translation.zh: 但他不能说什么 只能说“好吧

translation.en: I'll make you Kraft Macaroni & Cheese.
translation.zh: 我给你做卡夫的芝士通心粉”

translation.en: -I kept telling myself, -[Dave sighs]
translation.zh: 我一直在告诉我自己

translation.en: "It's all worth it."
translation.zh: “这一切都是值得的”

translation.en: I texted Dave one day,
translation.zh: 我有一天发信息给锡镐

translation.en: and I told him, "The first meal I want once this baby's out is sushi."
translation.zh: 告诉他“等孩子生出来 我第一顿饭要吃寿司”

translation.en: Good sushi, if we can. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 如果可以 找一家好吃的寿司店

translation.en: This is amazing.
translation.zh: 太赞了

translation.en: -I don't think I've ever seen -A whole... A whole tuna. [chuckles]
translation.zh: -我从没见过一整只… -一整只金枪鱼

translation.en: [Emily] So, how pregnant are you?
translation.zh: 你怀孕多久了？

translation.en: [Grace] So, right now, we're...
translation.zh: 到现在…

translation.en: -21 weeks, -[Emily] Uh-huh. and I'm craving everything.
translation.zh: 已经21周了 我现在什么都想吃

translation.en: It's... [chuckles]
translation.zh: 简直了…

translation.en: Obviously, sushi's one of them.
translation.zh: 显然寿司也是其中之一

translation.en: But it's been tough because there's a lot of foods that I love eating.
translation.zh: 但是太难了 因为我喜欢的很多食物

translation.en: Like, oysters and an occasional glass of wine,
translation.zh: 比如生蚝 比如偶尔小酌一杯

translation.en: -that I haven't been able to indulge. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 已经很久没有放纵过了

translation.en: You know, your book sheds light on something that so many women have questions about.
translation.zh: 你的书解释了很多孕妈的疑问

translation.en: [Emily] Yeah, I mean, they give you this list:
translation.zh: 是啊 书里会给出列表

translation.en: hot dogs, and sushi, and oysters,
translation.zh: 热狗、寿司和生蚝

translation.en: and it's just so hard to figure out which things were, like, important.
translation.zh: 搞清楚哪些事情是重要的 是很难的

translation.en: I got very frustrated. And I'm an economist. Like, I'm a data person,
translation.zh: 我很沮丧 我是学经济的 研究数据

translation.en: and so I ended up just, like, trying to basically use research
translation.zh: 所以我最后想通过研究

translation.en: to sort of figure out not only, like, are these things right,
translation.zh: 来弄清楚 哪些东西是正确的

translation.en: -but also why. -Right.
translation.zh: -以及原因是什么 -是哦

translation.en: Like, why am I not supposed to have turkey?
translation.zh: 比如为什么不能吃火鸡？

translation.en: And, like, many of those restrictions,
translation.zh: 说起来那些限制

translation.en: there's nothing special about being pregnant.
translation.zh: 其实怀孕没什么特别的

translation.en: -Mm. -Like, if you eat bad sushi
translation.zh: 比如 如果你吃了坏的寿司

translation.en: or a bad oyster, like, you can get sick.
translation.zh: 或者坏的生蚝 你就会生病

translation.en: -No matter what? -[Emily] No matter what.
translation.zh: -无论是否怀孕？ -是啊

translation.en: And it doesn't pass to the baby.
translation.zh: 而且并不会传给婴儿

translation.en: Like, there's not anything sort of pregnancy-specific
translation.zh: 吃坏食物会生病这件事

translation.en: -about the fact that it's bad. -Huh. That's interesting.
translation.zh: -并不是针对孕妇说的 -有意思

translation.en: [Grace] Was your doctor more,
translation.zh: 你的医生会说

translation.en: "It's okay to have a glass of wine once in a while," or was--
translation.zh: “偶尔喝一两杯酒也可以” 还是…

translation.en: [Emily] So, my doctor, she said, "Don't have a lot,
translation.zh: 我的医生会说“不要喝太多”

translation.en: If you want to, like, occasionally have a glass of wine, it's... it's, like, totally fine."
translation.zh: 如果偶尔小酌 也是肯定没事的

translation.en: I think that she had a reaction I think a lot of people have,
translation.zh: 我想很多人都会有她那样的反应

translation.en: which was, like, "Sure, we don't really know."
translation.zh: 就是“我们也并不清楚”

translation.en: what's the... what's the downside to avoiding it?
translation.zh: -但是少喝酒又有什么不好呢？ -是哦

translation.en: -Right. -And I think that was the thing
translation.zh: -但是少喝酒又有什么不好呢？ -是哦 我觉得这是最让我沮丧的事情

translation.en: I found most frustrating.
translation.zh: 我觉得这是最让我沮丧的事情

translation.en: Why isn't the fact that I would like to have this
translation.zh: 为什么不是我想喝就能喝呢？

translation.en: something that is valued?
translation.zh: 那是我觉得有价值的东西

translation.en: [Grace] Right! And so, at what point
translation.zh: 是啊！ 所以 在什么时候

translation.en: do you actually just take it as,
translation.zh: 你真正觉得

translation.en: "It's okay to have a glass of wine once in a while and have sushi."
translation.zh: “偶尔小酌 吃吃寿司 也是可以的”

translation.en: [Emily] All fish are okay to have occasionally.
translation.zh: 所有的鱼 偶尔吃都可以

translation.en: [server] This is a charcoal-seared pike mackerel
translation.zh: 这是炭烧秋刀鱼

translation.en: with deep-fried ginkgo nuts.
translation.zh: 配炸银杏仁

translation.en: -[Grace] This looks amazing. -[Emily] This really looks amazing.
translation.zh: -看着很好吃 -确实看着不错

translation.en: And your daughter's fine.
translation.zh: 你的女儿没问题吗？

translation.en: I have two kids. They're totally fine.
translation.zh: 我有俩孩子 都健健康康的

translation.en: I'm so-- [chuckles] I'm so happy I'm here with you right now.
translation.zh: 我很高兴今天出来跟你聊天

translation.en: As women, chefs are ready.
translation.zh: 作为女性主厨 我们时刻准备着

translation.en: We're, like, expected to be the caretakers of everyone.
translation.zh: 我们期望能够照顾每个人

translation.en: But having to juggle that
translation.zh: 但必须要兼顾一点

translation.en: when, you know, your employees, everyone needs something from you,
translation.zh: 当所有员工都找你有事的时候

translation.en: your tickets are racking up...
translation.zh: 你的任务就堆积起来了…

translation.en: -MLM to go. ...the baby is crying, like...
translation.zh: -外卖吗？ -宝宝在哭了

translation.en: You know, it's a lot that you have to balance.
translation.zh: 你懂的 这时就需要权衡很多了

translation.en: [Fanny] I have an almost-nine-month-old baby.
translation.zh: 我的宝宝差不多九个月了

translation.en: I'm still nursing him, which is really difficult,
translation.zh: 我还在照顾他 真的很难

translation.en: finding time while I'm at work
translation.zh: 在工作间歇找时间

translation.en: to, you know, to get milk for him.
translation.zh: 来给他喂奶

translation.en: It's a powerful and beautiful thing to be a woman.
translation.zh: 做女人是一件强大而美丽的事情

translation.en: It's really amazing to see
translation.zh: 看到这么多不同女性

translation.en: the many different women who are able to...
translation.zh: 都能挺过来

translation.en: go through this and...
translation.zh: 真的很神奇

translation.en: raise children and do their best.
translation.zh: 看着她们尽全力抚养孩子

translation.en: [Dave] So, this is miyeok-guk.
translation.zh: 这是海带汤

translation.en: It's traditionally beef broth,
translation.zh: 传统做法是用牛肉汤

translation.en: but my mom would make it with just myulchi broth,
translation.zh: 但我妈会用凤尾鱼汤来做

translation.en: which is just anchovy--
translation.zh: 只用凤尾鱼…

translation.en: No, miyeok-guk is no myulchi.
translation.zh: 不是的 海带汤不用凤尾鱼

translation.en: [Dave] You made it with myulchi -all the time! -No. no, no.
translation.zh: -你一直用凤尾鱼呀 -不是的

translation.en: Oh, my gosh. She's lying through her teeth.
translation.zh: 天啊 她在说谎呢

translation.en: -Why is miyeok-guk important? -[Sherri] A lot of iron.
translation.zh: 为什么海带汤这么重要？ 富含铁元素

translation.en: -[Grace] A lot of iron? -[Sherri] And a lot of minerals.
translation.zh: -富含铁元素？ -还有很多矿物质

translation.en: -[Grace] A lot of minerals. -Especially for the pregnant woman.
translation.zh: -很多矿物质 -很适合孕妇

translation.en: -[Grace] Pregnant woman. -For baby.
translation.zh: -孕妇 -还有宝宝

translation.en: [Grace] And it helps clean the blood after she's given birth.
translation.zh: 在生产以后 可以帮助净化血液

translation.en: [Dave] You have to eat it for 30 days, right?
translation.zh: 要喝30天吗？

translation.en: -[Kathy] More than that. -[Sherri] More than 30 days.
translation.zh: -不止30天 -不止30天

translation.en: So I have to make this for, what? Like, 90 days for Grace?
translation.zh: 所以我要连续90天 给格蕾丝做这道菜吗？

translation.en: -[Grace] My mom's gonna make it. -[Dave sighs in relief]
translation.zh: 我妈会来做的

translation.en: [Dave] Esther, how much miyeok-guk did you eat?
translation.zh: 埃斯特 你吃了多久的海带汤？

translation.en: [Esther] I ate it for three days, and I couldn't take it anymore.
translation.zh: 我吃了三天 就再也吃不下去了

translation.en: And then I... pretended to eat it for a month.
translation.zh: 我假装吃了一个月

translation.en: Mom doesn't know that.
translation.zh: 妈妈并不知道

translation.en: That's a symbolism of your defiance to your parents, Esther.
translation.zh: 这是你反抗父母的证据 埃斯特

translation.en: [in Korean] Are there foods that pregnant women should or shouldn't eat?
translation.zh: 什么东西是孕妇能吃的和不能吃的？

translation.en: [in English] Something round.
translation.zh: 要吃圆的

translation.en: Not square ones.
translation.zh: 不能吃方的

translation.en: Peoples, you know, character--
translation.zh: 更纯洁…性格…

translation.en: Square character is no good,
translation.zh: 性格太有棱角不好

translation.en: -so everything is round. -[Dave] What are you-- What?

translation.en: -I'm just trying to get a clarification. -[laughing]
translation.zh: 我只是想确认一下

translation.en: What's "square food"?

translation.en: [in Korean] How do I put it?

translation.en: Square foods are foods that don't make you comfortable.

translation.en: [Dave in English] She's not talking about the geometry of food.
translation.zh: 她说的不是食物的几何结构

translation.en: She's talking about a certain kind of--
translation.zh: 而是在说食物的…

translation.en: [Grace] The properties of a food.

translation.en: In our days, almost everyone fed their babies with formula.

translation.en: -[in English] But now, for me... -Uh-huh?

translation.en: [in Korean] You're going to breastfeed, right?
translation.zh: -你要喂母乳吗？ -母乳…

translation.en: It's good that you guys are going to do that.

translation.en: [Grace in English] Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: My mom would add soy sauce, but Dave's mom adds fish sauce.

translation.en: -[Dave] Right now? -Yeah. Just-- Yeah, the salt.
translation.zh: -现在吗？ -是啊 放盐

translation.en: [Dave] This is fascinating.
translation.zh: 太神奇了

translation.en: A very different approach. It's like two different kung fu styles.
translation.zh: 两种不同方法 就像两种不同的武功门派

translation.en: [Grace] It is.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: So, another thing is,
translation.zh: 另一件事是

translation.en: this actually carries over into anyone's birthday.

translation.en: [Dave] You eat this every day on your birthday to celebrate your mom.
translation.zh: 过生日要吃这道菜来感恩妈妈

translation.en: So...
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: whenever it's my birthday and my mom's not around,

translation.en: she'll call and say, "Did you eat your miyeok-guk?"
translation.zh: 她就会打电话说“你喝海带汤了吗？”

translation.en: [Sherri] They're gonna be good parents.

translation.en: Especially Grace.

translation.en: Let's be honest. You like Grace more than me anyway now.
translation.zh: 说实话吧 你更喜欢格蕾丝 已经超过喜欢我了

translation.en: -[laughs] -Thank you, Lord, we have a nice daughter-in-law in my family.

translation.en: That's the way. Mm.
translation.zh: 所以我才会这样

translation.en: -Is this me? -[Sherri] Yeah.

translation.en: I've never seen these photos.

translation.en: Oh, my God.

translation.en: Look at your hanbok. Where's that?

translation.en: [Sherri] That's somebody's wedding.

translation.en: -[Dave] Mom, you look great! -Hmm?

translation.en: -Oh, I was great! -[both laugh]

translation.en: [Dave] I have a picture of me being a bad parent.

translation.en: I have a picture of me not being able to be present.

translation.en: Me, being on planes.

translation.en: The alternative is...

translation.en: I just want to make bento boxes for their school lunches.
translation.zh: 我只想为他们做便当 带去学校当作午饭

translation.en: That would give me a lot of pleasure.
translation.zh: 那会让我非常开心

translation.en: [teacher in Japanese] Okay, it's time for preparing lunch.
translation.zh: （东京） 好了 该准备午餐了 先洗手吧

translation.en: Wash your hands.
translation.zh: 好了 该准备午餐了 先洗手吧

translation.en: [Dave in English] I've heard that, particularly in Japan,
translation.zh: 我听说 尤其是在日本

translation.en: the elementary school kids eat extraordinarily well.
translation.zh: 小学学生吃得特别好

translation.en: And that they'd always served each other.
translation.zh: 他们总是互相服务

translation.en: All these, like, Confucian elements
translation.zh: 这些都是儒家思想

translation.en: of service to each other, responsibility, accountability.
translation.zh: 为互相服务 对彼此负责

translation.en: [in Japanese] Group two, go ahead.
translation.zh: 第二组 去吧！

translation.en: [Dave in English] Rito is organizing...
translation.zh: 里托在组织…

translation.en: everyone.
translation.zh: 班上所有人

translation.en: Does that change every day?
translation.zh: 每天都换人吗？

translation.en: [Mori, in Japanese] Yes, a different student serves school lunch every day.
translation.zh: 是啊 每天都会换不同学生 组织大家吃午餐

translation.en: [in English] He's just organizing...
translation.zh: 他在组织…

translation.en: He's the traffic controller.
translation.zh: 他是交通管制员

translation.en: [Rito] Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: [Dave] This is amazing.
translation.zh: 太厉害了

translation.en: [Mori, in Japanese] Our menu always consists of some carbs like rice,
translation.zh: 我们的菜单总是包括一些碳水化合物 比如米饭

translation.en: with plenty of servings of veggies.
translation.zh: 还有足够的蔬菜

translation.en: Just like today's soup.
translation.zh: 比如今天的汤

translation.en: And just like today's sukiyaki, which also has a lot of vegetables.
translation.zh: 包括今天的寿喜烧 也有很多蔬菜

translation.en: On top of that, I add some fruit for vitamin C
translation.zh: 最重要的是 还有水果来补充维生素C

translation.en: to make it balanced.

translation.en: [both] ♪ Thanks for the food ♪
translation.zh: 感恩食物

translation.en: [classmates] Thanks for the food!
translation.zh: 感恩食物！

translation.en: [Mori] We let them decide how much they can eat that day,
translation.zh: 我们让他们自己决定 那天能吃多少

translation.en: and control portions before eating.
translation.zh: 并在吃饭前控制份量

translation.en: Some ask for more, some ask for less.
