translation.en: We encourage them to not waste anything on their plate.
translation.zh: 我们鼓励他们不要剩菜剩饭

translation.en: [Dave in English] They have to try to eat it all.
translation.zh: 他们要努力全部吃光

translation.en: [Mori, in Japanese] They are practicing how to use chopsticks and how to hold a bowl.
translation.zh: 他们正在练习如何使用筷子 以及如何拿碗

translation.en: [in Japanese] Lunch starts with eat-only time.
translation.zh: 午餐就是专心吃饭的时间

translation.en: It is for kids to just enjoy and focus on eating.
translation.zh: 这段时间 孩子们就是享受和专注吃饭

translation.en: The kids are not allowed to talk.
translation.zh: 是不允许讲话的

translation.en: [in English] What about, like, fats and sodium?
translation.zh: 那脂肪和钠呢？

translation.en: [in Japanese] There are recommended amounts,
translation.zh: 有推荐的用量

translation.en: so I'll try to keep it within the allowable range.
translation.zh: 所以我们会努力保持在允许的范围

translation.en: [in English] So, would a normal person say this is not salty enough?
translation.zh: 那么正常人会觉得不够咸吗？

translation.en: [Mori, in Japanese] Adults say this meal is delicious, too.
translation.zh: 成人也会觉得这些饭菜很好吃

translation.en: I make it flavorful using soup stock, which is traditional in Japan.
translation.zh: 我用了日本传统的汤料 使它很美味

translation.en: The stock makes it flavorful without too much salt.
translation.zh: 高汤不用加太多盐 味道就很好

translation.en: [Dave in English] Can I taste the food?
translation.zh: 我能尝尝吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: -[girl] Hello! -Hello.
translation.zh: 大家好！

translation.en: [Mori, in Japanese] Eat-only time has finished,
translation.zh: 吃饭时间结束了

translation.en: so everyone can now talk and enjoy the rest of the meal.
translation.zh: 现在大家可以说话了 把剩下的吃完

translation.en: -[in English] That's really good. -[Mori] Yeah?
translation.zh: 太好吃了！

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Emily] No, this is extremely good.
translation.zh: 这道菜最赞了

translation.en: Even for someone who's allowed to have sushi at all times.
translation.zh: 即使可以成天吃寿司的人 也会喜欢的

translation.en: -[Grace laughs] -I am not allowed to have sushi this good.
translation.zh: 我都没吃过这么好的寿司

translation.en: [Grace] This is amazing.
translation.zh: 简直不可思议

translation.en: [server] This is a charcoal-grilled Japanese freshwater eel
translation.zh: 这是烧炭的日本鲜鱼

translation.en: presented with wasabi and Sansho pepper.
translation.zh: 配以放在特种纸上的芥末

translation.en: [Emily] Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: You almost feel like you have to go through this pregnancy
translation.zh: 我总觉得 只能独自走过整个孕期

translation.en: alone and in hiding.
translation.zh: 而且要隐藏起来

translation.en: And you have to be careful that
translation.zh: 必须时刻小心

translation.en: you follow all these rules and restrictions
translation.zh: 遵守各种规矩和限制

translation.en: -because, otherwise-- -People are gonna judge you.
translation.zh: -否则… -别人就会说三道四

translation.en: Judge me. Yeah.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: -They'll say you don't like your baby. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 他们会说 你不爱宝宝

translation.en: [Emily] I think the other thing was people feel like they can tell you things.
translation.zh: 我觉得另一件事是 别人都觉得自己可以指手画脚

translation.en: Just, like, people on the street. One time, I was buying coffee,
translation.zh: 哪怕是路人 有一次我去买咖啡

translation.en: and some lady was like, "I hope that's decaf."
translation.zh: 一个女士说 “希望那是无咖啡因的”

translation.en: I should've been like, "It's not, actually, no.
translation.zh: 我就说 “其实并不是

translation.en: And I'm putting an extra shot in."
translation.zh: 我还买了加浓的”

translation.en: You wouldn't go up to someone who's overweight and be like,
translation.zh: 但不会有人走到一个超重的人面前说

translation.en: -"I hope that that's a salad you're--" -Right.
translation.zh: -“希望你吃的是沙拉” -是啊

translation.en: Why is it okay to comment...
translation.zh: 为什么对孕妇品头论足

translation.en: -[Grace] On a pregnant woman. -...on that?
translation.zh: -就没事呢 -是啊

translation.en: [Emily] I don't think there are a lot of other experiences
translation.zh: 我认为在其他很多事情上

translation.en: where people feel that they can judge you like that.
translation.zh: 人们就不会这样随便地品头论足

translation.en: [Grace] Right.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Pregnancy, although it's an amazing experience,
translation.zh: 怀孕的过程虽然很美好

translation.en: can also be a very lonely experience.
translation.zh: 但也很孤独

translation.en: I mean, first of all, there was a year and a half of trying.
translation.zh: 首先 已经有了一年半的备孕

translation.en: -Yeah. -And so, there was already that pressure
translation.zh: -是啊 -已经能够感受到

translation.en: of trying to conceive.
translation.zh: 努力怀孕的压力

translation.en: And then, once you do conceive,
translation.zh: 然后 怀孕以后

translation.en: again, that process might be lonely, too, because you can't really tell people
translation.zh: 过程也会十分孤单 因为在前三个月里

translation.en: you know, if you're pregnant or not in that first three months.
translation.zh: 你不能告诉别人自己怀孕的事

translation.en: And that was really difficult for me.
translation.zh: 对我来说 这是很难的

translation.en: I think that's terrible.
translation.zh: 我觉得这很难受

translation.en: I had a close friend who had a miscarriage.
translation.zh: 我有些闺蜜 她们流产了

translation.en: She told me early on.
translation.zh: 她很早就告诉我了

translation.en: And she said, "I'm so glad that I told people
translation.zh: 她说 “我很高兴我告诉别人了

translation.en: because this is such, like, an isolating experience.
translation.zh: 因为这是一个特别寂寞的过程”

translation.en: It's hard, right? Because I think most mothers
translation.zh: 这很艰难 是吧？ 因为我觉得大部分母亲

translation.en: definitely bond over the fact that it's something we all share.
translation.zh: 都很能互相理解 因为我们都经历过这个过程

translation.en: And that husbands won't really understand...
translation.zh: 而丈夫是没法真正理解的…

translation.en: -[Emily] Yeah. Yeah. -...at all. [chuckles]
translation.zh: -是啊 -没法完全理解

translation.en: [Dave] I was...
translation.zh: 我曾经…

translation.en: really worried that it probably wouldn't happen.
translation.zh: 很担心我们没法要上孩子

translation.en: And I was coming to terms with, like, "We're probably looking at adoption."
translation.zh: 我都想过跟她说 “我们可以考虑去收养”

translation.en: I wasn't ready for the day that it happened,
translation.zh: 我都没有准备好那一天的到来

translation.en: and I know when it happened.
translation.zh: 结果就来了

translation.en: It was the day after Tony Bourdain died.
translation.zh: 那是托尼·鲍登死后的第二天

translation.en: [scoffs] Yeah. It's fucking crazy.
translation.zh: 是啊 特别疯狂

translation.en: [interviewer] Why? Why did you know that?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道的？

translation.en: [Dave] Because we went to the clinic.
translation.zh: 因为我们去医院了

translation.en: And I was, like, sobbing.
translation.zh: 我当时都哭出来了

translation.en: You know?
translation.zh: 你知道吗？

translation.en: So...
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: much like I am now.
translation.zh: 就跟我现在一样

translation.en: And that was the last place I wanted to be.
translation.zh: 那是我最不想去的地方

translation.en: I just--
translation.zh: 我就觉得…

translation.en: It's the last... last thing I wanted to do at that time,
translation.zh: 当时我最不想做的事情

translation.en: was try to bring life into this world.
translation.zh: 就是把生命带到这个世上

translation.en: So...
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: when we found out, like, two weeks later,
translation.zh: 两周以后 我们知道以后

translation.en: I was like, "That's not fucking possible. That's not fucking possible."
translation.zh: 我就觉得 这不可能吧 这怎么可能呢

translation.en: [Grace] That's when Dave just lost it,
translation.zh: 当时锡镐有点崩溃

translation.en: and he couldn't... process,
translation.zh: 他有点想不通

translation.en: like, how life and death can pass each other by so closely.
translation.zh: 生与死怎么会距离这么近

translation.en: [Paul] I was at Momofuku
translation.zh: 我女儿出生的时候

translation.en: when my daughter was born.
translation.zh: 我当时在王母仙桃

translation.en: And I left work and got fucking wasted with my best friend.
translation.zh: 我请假出来 跟好哥们喝到烂醉

translation.en: And I was like, "I am fucked."
translation.zh: 我当时想 “我算完了”

translation.en: Being a chef, there wasn't really talk about life/work balance.
translation.zh: 作为主厨 根本谈不上生活和工作的平衡

translation.en: It was just work.
translation.zh: 基本都是工作

translation.en: I can look back and say I was a real shit or something,
translation.zh: 回首往事 我觉得我做得很差

translation.en: but for me it was like, "I'm singularly focused on this.
translation.zh: 但对我来说 “我特别专注于这件事

translation.en: Yes, I love my-- my-- my son, and I want to spend time with him,
translation.zh: 是的 我爱我的儿子 我想跟他在一起

translation.en: but, you know, I have a job to do."
translation.zh: 但我还有工作”

translation.en: [Floyd] I never had time to see what my boys were doing.
translation.zh: 我从来没有时间关注我的孩子

translation.en: One day a week, I had to do a double. So on Mondays, I did a double.
translation.zh: 每周有一天 我要工作双倍时间 所以我选在了周一

translation.en: I would go in in the morning, and come back when he was sleeping.
translation.zh: 我要早晨去上班 下班时他都睡着了

translation.en: So Tuesday evenings, when I did come in,
translation.zh: 所以周二晚上 我回家的时候

translation.en: he would totally ignore me
translation.zh: 他就会无视我

translation.en: as if I didn't exist.
translation.zh: 把我当作空气

translation.en: And that was his way of telling me, like, "Where the fuck were you?"
translation.zh: 他用这种方式在说 “你去哪里了？”

translation.en: [Grace] When Dave and I first met,
translation.zh: 我和锡镐刚认识时

translation.en: and just even throughout our first year of marriage,
translation.zh: 以及我们刚结婚的第一年

translation.en: at that point in his career,
translation.zh: 当时他的事业方面

translation.en: he had already entrusted a lot of the head chefs at his restaurant,
translation.zh: 他已经委任了很多主厨了

translation.en: so he wasn't in the restaurant hours.
translation.zh: 所以他不用在营业时间去餐厅

translation.en: Come Majordomo,
translation.zh: 当甩手掌柜

translation.en: that's when I realized, "Okay...
translation.zh: 那时候我才意识到 “好吧

translation.en: this is what people talk about
translation.zh: 难怪人们会说

translation.en: when they talk about chefs working crazy restaurant hours
translation.zh: 主厨在餐厅营业时间忙得团团转

translation.en: and having a hard time being home."
translation.zh: 根本没有时间顾家”

translation.en: [Dave] I'm a control freak at work.
translation.zh: 在工作中 我是一个控制狂

translation.en: Anywhere I have difficulties in life is when I try to...
translation.zh: 当我在生活中遇到困难的时候

translation.en: -attack life like work. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我就会像对待工作一样处理 -是啊

translation.en: Not a surprise, it doesn't work.
translation.zh: 不出所料 结果行不通

translation.en: I see how my work life can spill out negatively with Grace,
translation.zh: 我知道我的工作 对格蕾丝有很多负面影响

translation.en: and I was stressing her out.
translation.zh: 我让她压力很大

translation.en: And all of a sudden, she just falls on the floor
translation.zh: 突然之间 她就倒在了地板上

translation.en: in so much agony and pain.
translation.zh: 感觉特别痛苦

translation.en: We went to the hospital and nothing happened, but...
translation.zh: 然后我们就去了医院 没有什么大碍

translation.en: it was a terrifying experience for her, for me.
translation.zh: 但对她来说 对我来说 都是很可怕的经历

translation.en: I feel so bad for being such a jerk to somebody in a relationship.
translation.zh: 我对她那么不好 我感到很内疚

translation.en: -Yeah. -I was so ill-equipped,
translation.zh: 是啊 怪我做得不够 我特别怕听她说

translation.en: and it hurts me when she's always, like,
translation.zh: 怪我做得不够 我特别怕听她说

translation.en: "I know that work is, like, essentially your first love."
translation.zh: “我知道工作才是你的初恋”

translation.en: Right? Like, for her to even, like, utter those words,
translation.zh: 她说这些话的时候

translation.en: -is always like, "Oh, God." -[Sun] Yeah.
translation.zh: -我就觉得“我的天啊” -是啊

translation.en: It's crazy, but when you hold your baby in your arms for the first time...
translation.zh: 这事说来不可思议 但当你第一次抱着孩子时…

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: The feeling like you've awakened
translation.zh: 你会有觉醒的感觉

translation.en: and it's the first day of the rest of your life.
translation.zh: 那将是你余生的第一天

translation.en: And all the decisions you make in the business
translation.zh: 所有生意方面的决策

translation.en: are gonna be related to this child,
translation.zh: 都将会考虑到那个孩子

translation.en: because your one main question is going to be,
translation.zh: 因为你的首要问题会变成

translation.en: "How is this gonna affect my child?"
translation.zh: “这会对我的孩子产生什么影响？”

translation.en: I went in, one person, into the hospital.
translation.zh: 我一个人进了医院

translation.en: And I came out not knowing who I was any more.
translation.zh: 出院时 我已经不知道自己是谁了

translation.en: All of a sudden, my life goal has changed
translation.zh: 突然之间 我都人生目标就变了

translation.en: to keeping this baby alive.
translation.zh: 变成抚养孩子了

translation.en: And, you know, I don't want to do the things that I wanted to before.
translation.zh: 以前想做的事 现在都不想做了

translation.en: I don't have the same friends as I did before.
translation.zh: 我的朋友圈也变了

translation.en: You know, my personality changes.
translation.zh: 我的性格也变了

translation.en: Are you okay with this change? Or are you nostalgic for the past?
translation.zh: 你能适应这些变化吗？ 还是你更你怀念以前的生活？

translation.en: I'm nostalgic for the past. But at the same time,
translation.zh: 我很怀念过去 但与此同时 我也不会把其他事情摆在孩子之前

translation.en: I would never give up my kids for anything.
translation.zh: 但与此同时 我也不会把其他事情摆在孩子之前

translation.en: God, you love them so much. You know?
translation.zh: 天啊 我好爱他们

translation.en: It's overwhelming and it's exhausting,
translation.zh: 压力很大 也特别累

translation.en: but there is nothing in this world that has ever mattered before and...
translation.zh: 但世上没有比孩子更重要的事了

translation.en: and they do make you better people.
translation.zh: 他们会让你变成更好的人

translation.en: All right, what are we doing?
translation.zh: 好了 我们要做什么？

translation.en: [Grace] We're gonna go through all the baby stuff.
translation.zh: 我们要整理一下宝宝的东西

translation.en: You've never seen these outfits.
translation.zh: 你还没看过这些衣服

translation.en: [Dave] I didn't know you bought all this shit.
translation.zh: 我都不知道 你买了这些东西

translation.en: [Dave] Like, yeah, how do you do this?
translation.zh: 是啊 这样怎么用呀？

translation.en: -This is not a scarf. -[Grace] I have to Google it.
translation.zh: -这不是围巾 -我们得搜索一下

translation.en: Go ahead and wrap that around your midsection
translation.zh: 把它包在腹部

translation.en: Grabbing this end,
translation.zh: 抓住这一端

translation.en: and pulling it over the opposite shoulder.
translation.zh: 然后把它拉到另一边的肩膀上

translation.en: -You don't want to create... -[Dave] Slow the fuck down.
translation.zh: 不需要弄成… 放慢一点

translation.en: [chuckles] Okay, wait. So, now we bring it over.
translation.zh: 好啦 等等 我帮你弄过来

translation.en: [woman on TV] Gather it up, push it through this tag section,
translation.zh: 收拢到一起 穿过标牌的地方

translation.en: make an X on the front, here.
translation.zh: 在前面打一个叉

translation.en: -[Dave] Did I do something wrong? -[Grace] Let me just tie it from the back.
translation.zh: 我做错什么了吗？ 让我帮你从后面系一下

translation.en: [woman on TV] This one behind this way.
translation.zh: 这端 在这端后面

translation.en: We're gonna just start spreading
translation.zh: 我们要开始铺开了

translation.en: all the way across the bend.
translation.zh: 一直到绑住的地方

translation.en: [Grace] Okay, so maybe this guy's not for you.
translation.zh: 好吧 也许这家伙不适合你

translation.en: I have another one that's better for you.
translation.zh: 我还有一条 更适合你

translation.en: What do you think?
translation.zh: 你觉得呢？

translation.en: [Dave] I, for the life of me,
translation.zh: 就我的一生而言

translation.en: have never quite understood the idea of reincarnation.
translation.zh: 我没有特别理解过轮回的概念

translation.en: I think it's a beautiful thing to think about.
translation.zh: 我认为这是一件美好的事情

translation.en: -Other way. -[Dave] Maybe it's more of a metaphor.
translation.zh: -反过来 -可能更像是一种隐喻

translation.en: You know, I have to be the best version of myself,
translation.zh: 我要做最好的自己

translation.en: you have to be the best version of yourself,
translation.zh: 你要做最好的你

translation.en: to bestow the best qualities onto our-- our child,
translation.zh: 把最好的品质赋予我们的孩子

translation.en: so they can be the best version of themselves, right?
translation.zh: 让他们也能做最好的自己

translation.en: And that's just, like, a continuous link.
translation.zh: 这都是环环相扣的

translation.en: Clip that in.
translation.zh: 这里扣上

translation.en: You look like a dad already.
translation.zh: 你很有爸爸的样子了

translation.en: -Someone needs to put me in a Baby Bjorn. -[both laugh]
translation.zh: 谁来把我放进婴儿车里吧

translation.en: [Nancy] Congratulations!
translation.zh: 恭喜！

translation.en: -Thank you. -I just--
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -I just heard. -[Dave] Yeah.
translation.zh: -我刚听说 -是啊

translation.en: Well...
translation.zh: 嗯…

translation.en: it's happening.
translation.zh: 马上就要生了

translation.en: [Nancy] When I had my oldest,
translation.zh: 我怀第一胎时

translation.en: it hit me so unexpectedly.
translation.zh: 完全是意料之外

translation.en: Although I do know about the birds and the bees, by the way.
translation.zh: 虽然我知道做爱和生孩子

translation.en: So I know where she came from.
translation.zh: 我知道她是怎么来的

translation.en: -[Dave laughs] -However, I was 28.
translation.zh: 不过我当时28岁

translation.en: I was the pastry chef at the recently opened Spago restaurant.
translation.zh: 我是刚刚开张的膳朵餐厅的糕点师

translation.en: [Dave] Was there ever a moment, like, "I can't cook anymore."
translation.zh: 有没有一瞬间觉得“我当不了厨师了”

translation.en: Nope. There was just never an option.
translation.zh: 没有 那是绝对不可能的

translation.en: I knew I was having a baby,
translation.zh: 我知道我要当妈了

translation.en: and I knew I was gonna continue doing what I was gonna do.
translation.zh: 我也知道 我要继续做一名厨师

translation.en: -And I was gonna make it work. -Man.
translation.zh: -我一定要做到 -天啊

translation.en: I didn't tell Wolfgang that I was pregnant because I was sort of afraid to.
translation.zh: 我没有告诉沃尔夫冈 我怀孕了 因为我有点害怕

translation.en: But I told him after about five, six months
translation.zh: 但五六个月后 我还是告诉他了

translation.en: that I was pregnant, and his reaction immediately was,
translation.zh: 我说我怀孕了 他的反应是

translation.en: "So what? So, you bring the baby to work."
translation.zh: “怎么办？你要带着孩子上班吗？”

translation.en: And that's exactly what I did.
translation.zh: 我就是那么做的

translation.en: I used to put her in the giant Hobart mixing bowl.
translation.zh: 我曾经把她放在巨大的搅拌碗里

translation.en: -[Dave laughs] -[Nancy] In there. And she loved it.
translation.zh: 她还挺开心的！

translation.en: And she couldn't go anywhere. She was safe.
translation.zh: 她哪都去不了 挺安全的

translation.en: -It's a perfect... -Exactly, don't forget about that.
translation.zh: -完美！ -没错 别忘记这一招

translation.en: When I started La Brea Bakery,
translation.zh: 当我创办拉布雷亚面包店时

translation.en: and six months later, opened Campanile,
translation.zh: 六个月后 又开了坎帕尼莱

translation.en: I was lucky enough that I lived upstairs from the restaurant.
translation.zh: 我很幸运 我就住在餐馆的楼上

translation.en: I would bake from midnight to eight.
translation.zh: 我在午夜到早晨这段时间做烘焙

translation.en: I would run upstairs, just covered in flour,
translation.zh: 然后满身面粉地跑上楼

translation.en: throw together my kids' lunch.
translation.zh: 给孩子们做午饭

translation.en: I would then immediately go to sleep for about three or four hours.
translation.zh: 然后才去睡觉 大概睡三四个小时

translation.en: I'd wake up around 11, and I would go into the pastry department,
translation.zh: 我会在11点左右醒来 走到馅饼区

translation.en: and I would get the cooks set for that day,
translation.zh: 让厨师们做好准备

translation.en: make some dessert, show them some new ones,
translation.zh: 制作甜点 教他们新菜

translation.en: go back upstairs, take another nap,
translation.zh: 然后回到楼上 再睡一觉

translation.en: come back downstairs and plate desserts for the evening.
translation.zh: 再下楼来 准备晚上的甜点

translation.en: I'd go back up around ten,
translation.zh: 我大概10点回来

translation.en: and I would take a two-hour nap,
translation.zh: 大概睡两个小时

translation.en: and down at 12 to work.
translation.zh: 12点起来工作

translation.en: And that's what I did.
translation.zh: 我就是这样做的

translation.en: For close to two years, that schedule.
translation.zh: 坚持了将近两年

translation.en: I was getting, like, stressed out just listening to that. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 听你那么说 我都有压力了

translation.en: Like, I've always thought about you as someone that was a mentor/hero
translation.zh: 我一直把你当作导师和英雄

translation.en: because of just your culinary endeavors, right?
translation.zh: 因为你会刻苦钻研厨艺

translation.en: But now I'm looking at it, like, "Oh, man, she's done this
translation.zh: 但现在我会觉得 “天啊 她做到了

translation.en: while raising three kids and growing a business."
translation.zh: 养了三个孩子 还事业有成”

translation.en: Like, I don't even understand that.
translation.zh: 我都还没搞明白

translation.en: You gotta step back and you gotta realize,
translation.zh: 你必须退后一步 你必须意识到

translation.en: and this might be a silly comparison,
translation.zh: 虽然这样比较不太恰当

translation.en: but having a child
translation.zh: 但是养孩子

translation.en: is not like creating a recipe.
translation.zh: 跟出新菜是不一样的

translation.en: You don't have that control.
translation.zh: 你没法掌控一切

translation.en: And you gotta do the best you can,
translation.zh: 而且你必须拼尽全力

translation.en: and give all the tools for success.
translation.zh: 为了成功不遗余力

translation.en: But in the end,
translation.zh: 但最终

translation.en: that kid is gonna grow up, and that kid's gonna be that kid.
translation.zh: 孩子会长大 会永远是你的孩子

translation.en: [Dave] What are you feeling, Grace?
translation.zh: 你感觉怎么样 格蕾丝？

translation.en: [Grace] It's snowing. It's so pretty.
translation.zh: 下雪了 好漂亮

translation.en: [Dave] You're doing great, babe.
translation.zh: 你表现很好 宝贝

translation.en: What are you feeling now?
translation.zh: 你现在感觉如何？

translation.en: -[quietly] I'm trying to stay calm. -[Dave] You're doing great.
translation.zh: 我在努力保持镇静 你做得很好

translation.en: -Thanks. -[Dave sniffling] I can't stop crying.
translation.zh: 谢谢 我忍不住要哭了

translation.en: -I should turn the camera on you. -[Dave chuckles]
translation.zh: 我应该用相机拍拍你

translation.en: [Dave] We'll see you guys soon.
translation.zh: 一会见你们咯

translation.en: [woman] All right, Dad, you come around, right here.
translation.zh: 好了 孩子父亲 过来看看

translation.en: -[Dave] Okay. -[woman] And give me the camera.
translation.zh: -好的 -把摄像机给我吧

translation.en: [Grace] I'm so proud of Dave.
translation.zh: 我很替锡镐骄傲

translation.en: It's gonna bring a new set of challenges,
translation.zh: 这会带来一系列新的挑战

translation.en: but at the same time, it's just been so exciting for us.
translation.zh: 与此同时 也会是一件令人开心的事

translation.en: [Edouardo] When I wake up, I get a "Good morning, Daddy."
translation.zh: 早晨醒来 儿子会说 “爸爸早上好”

translation.en: That's my stress release.
translation.zh: 我的压力就全都消散了

translation.en: [Paul] I just had to keep going, no matter what.
translation.zh: 无论如何 我都要努力前行

translation.en: Like, literally every day from that point on,
translation.zh: 从那天开始

translation.en: was with my daughter in mind.
translation.zh: 我的脑子里就都是女儿了

translation.en: [Dave] Feeding your kid,
translation.zh: 养育孩子

translation.en: it's the microcosm of all your beliefs.
translation.zh: 是所有信仰的缩影

translation.en: It almost brings cooking back to why you cared about it to begin with.
translation.zh: 让烹饪这件事回到了最初的初衷

translation.en: I'm here to put all of myself in this
translation.zh: 我会全心投入其中

translation.en: so you can get some nourishment and some love from it.
translation.zh: 让你得到营养 得到关爱
